body:
Nick-


Weather data for Abu Dhabi, UAE, and Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, is available
from the EnergyPlus website:


http://www.eere.energy.gov/buildings/energyplus/cfm/weather_data2.cfm/re
gion=2_asia_wmo_region_2


There is a document that defines the fields in the data file under
'weather data format definition' link on the left side of the page.


These files contain hourly data, and usually have horizontal
illuminances and sky zenith luminance.


Regards,
Matt


-----Original Message-----
